title: Hey diddle, diddle, a Birthday for Biddle!
content:
Happy Birthday, Terry!

ChrisL

 [‹ Free Licence Commercial Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084322/http:/typophile.com/node/40418 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Album Cover Game ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084322/http:/typophile.com/node/40639 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Oh, yes, have a happy birthday, Terry!
Have a rappin’ good time, bro! :-)

Terry, muy feliz cumpleaños, my friend!

Best wishes,  
Ricardo
Best of birthdays to da man with da funky dreads (anyway last time I checked) ;^) Have a good one, Terry — let’s share some pops’n’breaks next time I cross the pond (or you come Olde Worlde-side).

_let’s share some pops’n’breaks next time I cross the pond_

No doubt. And no, I don’t have dreads anymore. I’m more like Bald Extended these days. ;)

Thanks for the birthday wishes all! The big three-O this year.
Oh snap! I realized I just missed your birthday Dan! Happy belated!
Happy Birthday, Terry. All the best for the coming year.
Happy Birthday Terry! Looking forward to that Bizzle!
HBD Terry. Also looking forward to the layered font!
